default.value:
# GitHub Actions Deduplication Workflow Patterns

## Performance Metrics
- Cache build: < 10 seconds for 100K articles
- Duplicate check: < 5 seconds for 10K articles
- Memory usage: < 200MB
- O(1) hash-based lookups: sub-millisecond

## Integration Points

### Pre-Process Phase (Before Analysis)
- Build deduplication cache in memory
- Run duplicate detection with statistics
- Log cache size and build time
- Ready for O(1) lookups during processing

### Post-Process Phase (After Analysis)
- Generate duplicate detection report
- Extract metrics (duplicate count, total articles)
- Save report to artifacts
- Alert if duplicates found

### Maintenance Workflow (Weekly)
- Standalone deduplication check
- Optional duplicate removal
- Performance metrics collection
- Database artifact preservation

## Key Features
1. Hash-based O(1) lookups (no full database scans)
2. In-memory cache built once per run
3. Batch processing for efficiency
4. Statistics reporting in job summaries
5. Artifact preservation of cleaned databases
6. Weekly scheduled maintenance

## Workflow Files Created
- .github/workflows/deduplication-check.yml (standalone maintenance)
- .github/workflows/rss-complete-pipeline.yml (updated with pre/post checks)
- .github/workflows/refresh-titles.yml (updated with pre-refresh check)
